 * otherwise ordinary data.
 *
 * @constructor
 * @param {array|object} definition - The formal definition of the monkey.

    this.tree.on('_monkey', this.recursiveListener);

    this.update();
  }

    key: 'relatedPaths',
    value: function relatedPaths() {

    key: 'release',
    value: function release() {
